title: Textarea

# Textarea <span class="text-size-0">`go-textarea`</span>

<!-- Description -->

<div class="text-size-1">
  Textarea is a form control used for multi-line text input.
</div>


## Accessibility
- Focus visually
- Error message announced upon focus
- When `maxlength` is set, screen-reader-only announcement available when user reaches character limit.

## Demo
